aka: The Woman Who Leaves Work in the Morning
trans_title: The Woman Who Leaves Work in the Morning
introduction: Jang-mi, a nightclub hostess, falls in love with Song Wu-yeol whom she meets in the park when he sketches her face. Wu-yeol sends Young-ah, whom he's been supporting like a sister, to work for Jang-mi. Jang-mi sees that Wu-yeol and Young-ah are becoming close and so sends her to her house. Jang-mi learns from Young-ah that Wu-yeol has a fiance'e, and spends bitter and futile days. Jang-mi has a daughter from Wu-yeol and raises her alone. She becomes ill and so has their daughter entered in Wu-yeol's family register. She dies and Wu-yeol gives her a farewell kiss.
